creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
life_date: Utagawa Toyokuni, Japanese, 1769–1825; Uemura Yohei, Publisher, Japanese
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: The Seven Transformations (Shichi henge no uchi 七変化之内)
text: Related to the play Osozakura teniha no nanamoji 遅桜手爾葉七字, performed at the Nakamura Theater in the 3rd lunar month of 1811.
title: Actor Nakamura Utaemon III as Ama
